name: AI vs Human: The Quiz
description:
This game is a submission to (A)I, Gamer jam and was developed by Sergey Germogentov and Gonzalo Perez de la Ossa over a couple of days in February 2023.

Think you have what it takes to outsmart an AI? 

In this innovative quiz game, you'll be put to the test as you try to differentiate between human-generated answers and those generated by a cutting-edge artificial intelligence. Every round will challenge you in new and exciting ways. So what are you waiting for? Prove your skills and see if you have what it takes to be a winner!
